summary: This is an internal Bureau of Prisons email regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status. It states that Epstein is being taken off Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. The document shows the message was sent to 71 recipients, with 27 acknowledging receipt.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the email, identified by his BOP number 76318-054, who is being taken off Psych Observation status.

events.title: Epstein taken off Psych Observation
events.description: An internal BOP email indicates inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being removed from Psych Observation status and needs to be assigned an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: The document is an internal BOP email dated July 30, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status.
It states that Epstein (BOP #76318-054) is being taken off Psych Observation.
It directs that he needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.
The email was sent to 71 recipients, with 27 acknowledging receipt and 44 responses pending.
This administrative action occurred approximately two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
